adjectives.description: socialist (comparative more socialist, superlative most socialist)

entries.meaning: Of, relating to, supporting, or advocating socialism.
examples: ...it must be remembered that in a Socialist farm or manufactory, each labourer would be under the eye not of one master, but of the whole community.

entries.meaning: One who supports or advocates socialism.
examples: A contest, who can do most for the common good, is not the kind of competition which Socialists repudiate.
